commitMessage:
feat: implement automatic lessons learned generation during ship (HODGE-286)

## What Changed
- Added `generateLessonsDraft()` method to ship.ts with 98 new lines
- Imported `LearningResult` type for proper TypeScript typing
- Integrated lessons generation into ship workflow after pattern learning
- Created smoke tests for lessons generation (69 lines)
- Added automatic cleanup for drafts with minimal changes

## Why This Change
The ship command's step 5 instructed to capture lessons learned, but no
implementation existed. Since HODGE-003, no lessons files were being created
despite shipping 280+ features. This creates objective drafts with metrics
and git statistics that AI can later enhance with insights.

## Impact
- Automatic lessons draft creation for every shipped feature
- Objective metrics captured: files changed, patterns found, test status
- No empty files left behind - cleanup when changes are minimal
- Non-blocking implementation - ship continues even if lessons generation fails
- Improved knowledge retention across features

## Technical Details
- Lessons generated after pattern learning (ship.ts:571)
- Draft includes git statistics, commit message, and metrics
- Checks for significant changes before creating file
- Error handling ensures ship process continues regardless

Closes HODGE-286
